message: Let's be fair, 60-40 is a good deal!
Let's flip it, I think 60-40 is fair!
You had your chance, now it's my turn again. Considering inflation, this is more than fair!
I'm willing to compromise. 45-55 is a good middle ground, considering the inflation.
You're running out of time, Bob! Inflation is eating away at your share. This is my final reasonable offer.
